objects.text: • Height Adjustable • Padded Comfort • Sturdy Design

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and professional promotional design highlighting a premium office chair. The background consists of a radial gradient in deep blue tones with decorative elements including circles, dashed strokes, and diagonal lines adding dynamism. At the center, a high-resolution image of an office chair is surrounded by a white dashed circle, anchoring the visual focus. The top section displays a bold white tagline (`tagline`) and a subtitle (`heading`) in contrasting peach color. A circular price badge with gradient fill houses the `price` text in futuristic blue font. The lower section features the `description` text outlining key benefits, and a rectangular peach `cta_background` behind the bold `cta` prompt. 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #255977, #3A6A8A, #4A7B9D
- White: #FFFFFF
- Peach/Accent: #F9D29D, #E5B46D
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated and minimalist office chair, emphasizing a neutral and clean aesthetic. The main color, a soft ivory white (#F2F0EB), dominates the chair’s upholstered sections, providing a sleek, modern feel. Black (#1C1C1C) is prominently used for the chair's base, controls, and armrest frames, offering a striking contrast that adds depth and focus. A medium gray (#4A4A4A) subtly blends the base and seat height mechanism components for a seamless transition. These colors are well-balanced, with the white being the dominant base and black framing and outlining features to maintain clarity and sophistication. Ideal for crisp, modern banner design.
